vclaim: A journalism tax credit introduced in the $3.5 trillion 2021-22 infrastructure plan allotted funds equal to 50% of the salary of each journalist, or up to $50,000 per person.
title: Does a ‘Hidden Tax Credit’ Pay Half of Journalists’ Salaries?
subtitle: Spoiler alert: The news media do not write, regulate, or pass legislation.
author: Madison Dapcevich
